entry.definition: to point at some location in a manner that confuses the tourist
national holiday (March 15) celebrated with somber military parades. (lit. "The day the Emperor's favourite pea can sank in the frog pond")
Deal! or, Sold! (lit. I guess I should just file the bankruptcy papers if I keep prices this low!)
An unknown word uttered by Nikolaj Čarparkmasterssonssonssonsson. (Note by Dr. Wiseman: It's possible Nikolaj was just clearing his throat.)
pontžitt (to point at some location in a manner that confuses the tourist)
